article.title: Setup
article.para: Like in the simple-tutorial we want to use maven 3 to build and deploy our application.
We should be able to start an embedded tomcat-server with maven running the elearning-application:

If we want to start the elearning-application with cdi, then execute foregoing command in the jpasecurity-jsf-elearning-cdi-application folder. To start the elearning-application with jsf, execute the foregoing command in the jpasecurity-jsf-elearning-jsf-application folder.
If everything works all right, tomcat started successfully and you can visit the elearning-application here(jsf) and here(cdi) respectively
